after.name: [BL-QA] FV-284 - Order Summary in checkout- Mobile

changes.value:
<style>/*
** Author: Nuno
** Company: Biglight
** Date: 12/2024
** Test: FV-284
** Variation: Variation-1
*/
.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary {
  padding-left: 6px;
  padding-right: 6px;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary > h2 {
  display: none;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  -webkit-box-pack: justify;
      -ms-flex-pack: justify;
          justify-content: space-between;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary h2 {
  padding-bottom: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary div.bl-fv-284-order-value {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  gap: 24px;
  padding-right: 6px;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary div.bl-fv-284-order-value svg {
  -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
  transition: -webkit-transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
  -o-transition: transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
  transition: transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
  transition: transform 0.25s ease-in-out, -webkit-transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary div.bl-fv-284-order-value svg.bl-fv-284-rotate {
  -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg);
      -ms-transform: rotate(180deg);
          transform: rotate(180deg);
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary div.checkout-mini-cart {
  display: none;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary div.checkout-mini-cart.bl-fv-284-active {
  padding-top: 22px;
  border-top: 1px solid #ccc;
  display: block;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=variation-1.css.map */</style>

<style>/*
** Author: Nuno
** Company: Biglight
** Date: 12/2024
** Test: FV-284
** Variation: Variation-1
*/
.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary {
  padding-left: 6px;
  padding-right: 6px;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary > h2 {
  display: none;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
      -ms-flex-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  -webkit-box-pack: justify;
      -ms-flex-pack: justify;
          justify-content: space-between;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  border-bottom: 2px solid #eee;
  padding-bottom: 22px;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary h2 {
  padding-bottom: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary div.bl-fv-284-order-value {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  gap: 24px;
  padding-right: 6px;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary div.bl-fv-284-order-value span {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #404041;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-family: HelveticaNowTextMedium, sans-serif;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary div.bl-fv-284-order-value svg {
  -webkit-transition: -webkit-transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
  transition: -webkit-transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
  -o-transition: transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
  transition: transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
  transition: transform 0.25s ease-in-out, -webkit-transform 0.25s ease-in-out;
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary .bl-fv-284-order-summary div.bl-fv-284-order-value svg.bl-fv-284-rotate {
  -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg);
      -ms-transform: rotate(180deg);
          transform: rotate(180deg);
}

.FV-284_var_1 div.checkout-minisummary div.checkout-mini-cart {
  max-height: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  -webkit-transition: max-height 0.5s ease-in-out;
  -o-transition: max-height 0.5s ease-in-out;
  transition: max-height 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=variation-1.css.map */</style>

changes.value:
<style>/*
** Author: Daniel
** Company: Biglight
** Date: 5/2025
** Test: FV-292.1
** Variation: Control
*/
.FV-292-1_var_0 button#add-to-cart,
.FV-292-1_var_0 .bl-fv-231-floating-bar button.black-button,
.FV-292-1_var_0 .add-care-plus-pdp-wrapper button.black-button,
.FV-292-1_var_0 .pdp-persistent-bar .persistent-bar-bottom button.black-button,
.FV-292-1_var_0 #cart-checkout-sticky .basket-actions a.button.black-button,
.FV-292-1_var_0 #cart-checkout-sticky button.black-button,
.FV-292-1_var_0 #primary button[type="submit"].black-button:not(#add-coupon),
.FV-292-1_var_0 .carousel.product-carousel .product-tile .show-in-dialog-content a.show-in-dialog.button.black-button {
  background: #009de0;
  border-radius: 50px;
}

.FV-292-1_var_0 #primary button[type="submit"].secondary-button {
  border-color: #009de0;
  color: #009de0;
  border-radius: 50px;
}

.FV-292-1_var_0 button#add-careplus-pdp {
  background: #009de0;
  border-radius: 50px;
}

.FV-292-1_var_0 div.bl-fv-226-floating-bar button.button-fancy-large.black-button {
  background: #009de0;
  border-radius: 50px;
}

.FV-292-1_var_0 a.button.primary-button.add-to-basket-btn.black-button {
  background: #009de0;
  border-radius: 50px;
}

.FV-292-1_var_0 button.button-fancy-large.add-to-cart.bundle.black-button {
  background: #009de0;
  border-radius: 50px;
}

.FV-292-1_var_0 #bonus-product-list .bonus-product-item button.select-bonus-item,
.FV-292-1_var_0 #bonus-product-list button.add-to-cart-bonus {
  border-radius: 50px;
}

.FV-292-1_var_0 .bonus-discount-container button.select-bonus,
.FV-292-1_var_0 #bonus-product-list .bonus-product-item button.bonus-remove-link,
.FV-292-1_var_0 #bonus-product-list button.add-to-cart-bonus:not(:disabled) {
  background: #009de0;
  border-radius: 50px;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=control.css.map */</style>

after.name: [BL-QA] FV-280 - Reposition Order Summary and CTA

changes.value:
<style>/*
** Author: Nuno
** Company: Biglight
** Date: 12/2024
** Test: FV-280
** Variation: Variation-1
*/
.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper {
  max-height: none;
  display: none;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper.bl-fv-280-ready {
  display: block;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  max-height: none;
  position: relative;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-items {
  width: 65%;
  padding-right: 50px;
  overflow-y: visible;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-items div.item-last-col div.item-total {
  max-width: 48%;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-items div.item-last-col div.first-md {
  max-width: 52%;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-items div.item-last-col div.first-md div.item-quantity {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items .bl-fv-280-sticky-wrapper {
  width: 35%;
  position: relative;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-bottom-row {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 30px 30px 50px 30px;
  overflow-y: visible;
  position: sticky;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-bottom-row > div.wrapper > div.row {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
      -ms-flex-direction: column;
          flex-direction: column;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-bottom-row > div.wrapper > div.row > div {
  max-width: none;
  padding: 0;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-bottom-row > div.wrapper > div.row > div:first-of-type {
  -webkit-box-ordinal-group: 2;
      -ms-flex-order: 1;
          order: 1;
  padding-top: 50px;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-bottom-row .shipping-method-selector {
  border-bottom: none;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-bottom-row .shipping-method-selector .shipping-method-option {
  border-right: none;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-bottom-row .shipping-method-selector div.search-location-content div.search-input {
  max-width: 65%;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div.cart-wrapper div.bl-fv-280-cart-items div.cart-bottom-row .shipping-method-selector div.search-location-content div.search-btn {
  max-width: none;
}

.FV-280_var_1 .cart-finance-info {
  margin-top: 80px;
}

.FV-280_var_1 div#cart-checkout-sticky {
  display: none;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=variation-1.css.map */</style>

experimentName: [BL-QA] FV-280 - Reposition Order Summary and CTA

changes.value:
<style>/*
** Author: Nuno
** Company: Biglight
** Date: 4/2025
** Test: FV-252.1
** Variation: Variation-1
*/
@media only screen and (max-width: 755px) {
  .FV-252-1_var_1 body.bl-fv-252-1-scroll-lock {
    overflow: hidden !important;
    position: fixed;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
  }
}

.FV-252-1_var_1 #simpleSearch .bl-fv-252-1-cancel-icon-events button.search_black,
.FV-252-1_var_1 #simpleSearch .bl-fv-252-1-cancel-icon-events a.clear-search-btn {
  pointer-events: none;
}

.FV-252-1_var_1 .bl-fv-252-1-overlay {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35);
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  z-index: 2147483640;
